roleset.name: masticate
roleset.note: CHEW-V NOTES: Corresponds to VN class chew-39.2-1. (from chew.01-v)
CHEWING-N NOTES: Corresponds with chew.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from chewing.01-n)

example.name: good example, awkward syntax
example.text: Michelle Pfeiffer can't chew gum and sing at the same time.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Jeremiah's constant chewing of gum gave him fresh breath.

roleset.name: masticate completely
roleset.note: CHEW_UP-V NOTES: Go look up 'masticate,' you dirty-minded little buggers. (from chew.02-v)

example.name: active
example.text: Mr. Guber replies that ``this is a Goliath, this Time Warner, trying *trace* to chew up two fellows who have done only well for them for a long period of time.''
example.arg: two fellows who have done only well for them for a long period of time

example.name: passive
example.text: ``One of the three major markets in the world is getting chewed *trace* up pretty bad.''
example.arg: *trace* -> One of the three major markets in the world
